animeDescription: Although Talpa has been defeated, the Warriors don't get much of a break. As they celebrate Ryo's birthday party, the news tells them of a strange killer in samurai armor wreaking havoc in New York. And the armor looks very familiar. Now, they will have to battle the ancient sorcerer Shikaisen for Sage's life!(Source: AniDB)
animeRelated: ['Prequel: Yoroiden Samurai Troopers', 'Sequel: Yoroiden Samurai Troopers Kikoutei Densetsu']
